sn35.237:4.5: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, cakkhusmiṃ sati cakkhusamphassapaccayā uppajjati ajjhattaṃ sukhaṃ dukkhaṃ … pe …
sn35.237:4.7: manasmiṃ sati manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati ajjhattaṃ sukhaṃ dukkhaṃ … pe ….
sn35.237:5.1: Hatthesu, bhikkhave, asati ādānanikkhepanaṃ na hoti;
sn35.237:5.4: kucchismiṃ asati jighacchā pipāsā na hoti.
sn35.237:5.5: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, cakkhusmiṃ asati cakkhusamphassapaccayā nuppajjati ajjhattaṃ sukhaṃ dukkhaṃ … pe …
sn35.237:5.7: manasmiṃ asati manosamphassapaccayā nuppajjati ajjhattaṃ sukhaṃ dukkhan”ti.
